summary: This function creates an iterable whose iterator can iterate over the names of the entries in a record.
returns: Return an unmodifiable list containing the names of the entries in the input.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0Atuple Capital (city : String, country : String);%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val capital = new Capital(%22Ottawa%22, %22Canada%22);%0A%0A    val result = F::iter(capital);%0A%0A    foreach (key : String in result)%0A    {%0A        val value = F::get(capital, key);%0A%0A        F::println(%22Key: %22 .. key);%0A        F::println(%22Value: %22 .. value);%0A        F::println();%0A    }%0A}
